item.description:
Filippo Ristorante ( http://www.filipporis... ) is a well known Italian restaurant in the North End. The food is focused on the Abruzzo region of Italy. Price ranges are: Appetizers $3.25-12.50, Pasta $8.95-22.50, Entrees $14.50-29.50. The restaurant is located at the corner of Causeway and Endicott Streets at the large intersection which includes the Charlestown Bridge. North Station (also on Causeway St.) is the nearest T-stop. We'll begin with a cocktail hour from 6:00-7:00 at the bar and head to a North End cafe for coffee and dessert after dinner. Please hold your RSVP for Monday 10/25, Tuesday 10/26 or Wednesday 10/27 up to 4:00 PM. This should limit cancellations.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar from 6:00-7:00.
item.name: Filippo Ristorante- Dinner
